Vps_CaptChStatusArgs Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » Capture API

Capture Channel Get Status IOCTL input arguments. More...

#include <vps_capture.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 chNum
 
UInt32 frameInterval
 

Detailed Description

Capture Channel Get Status IOCTL input arguments.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatusArgs::chNum

[IN] Channel number for which status is requested.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatusArgs::frameInterval

[IN] Expected interval in units of timer ticks between frames. Vps_CaptChStatus.isVideoDetected is FALSE if no frame is captured for a duration of 'frameInterval x 2', else Vps_CaptChStatus.isVideoDetected is TRUE.
